org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.bulk

Class MockBulkTransportClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.BaseTransportClient
      • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.BaseIngestTransportClient
        • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.bulk.BulkTransportClient
          • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.bulk.MockBulkTransportClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feeder, Ingest

    public class MockBulkTransportClient
extends BulkTransportClient
implements Ingest
    Mock client for Bulk API. Do not perform actions on a real cluster. Useful for testing or dry runs.
